pkgmetadata.longdescription: PEDALFAST Data // Data files and documentation for PEDiatric vALidation oF vAriableS in TBI (PEDALFAST). The data was used in "Functional Status Scale in Children With Traumatic Brain Injury: A Prospective Cohort Study" by Bennett, Dixon, et al (2016) doi:10.1097/PCC.0000000000000934.
